Pointful

Identity, App Design, UX Design

Pointful is a work in progress in which I created a task manager that motivates the user into completing their to-do list by keeping an avatar plant healthy and growing. Points are awarded by completing tasks and adding in new tasksÂ consistently.

This is a student project and purely conceptual.
